snippet: Follow a promotional stunt in which a mysterious Twitter post led to a countdown clock, Mr. Timberlake released a new song, "Suit & Tie featuring JAY Z," in advance of a coming album, "The 20/20 Experience," his first since 2006.
abstract: Follow a promotional stunt in which a mysterious Twitter post led to a countdown clock, Mr. Timberlake released a new song, "Suit & Tie featuring JAY Z," in advance of a coming album, "The 20/20 Experience," his first since 2006.

headline.main: Justin Timberlake Releases New Song and Announces New Album
headline.print_headline: Timberlake Releases Song, Announces New Album
